General.Name: Shandong Fiberglass Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Fiberglass Group Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of glass fiber and related products in China and internationally. It offers glass fiber yarn and glass fiber products that are used in building materials, transportation, electronic appliances, environmental protection, wind power, and other applications. Shandong Fiberglass Group Co., Ltd was founded in 2008 and is based in Linyi, China.
